WarlockCantrips.Name: Eldritch Blast
WarlockCantrips.Description: A beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature within range.

WarlockCantrips.Name: Chill Touch
WarlockCantrips.Description: You create a ghostly, skeletal hand in the space of a creature within range.

WarlockCantrips.Name: Mage Hand
WarlockCantrips.Description: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range.

WarlockCantrips.Name: Minor Illusion
WarlockCantrips.Description: You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration.

WarlockCantrips.Name: Poison Spray
WarlockCantrips.Description: You extend your hand toward a creature you can see within range and project a puff of noxious gas from your palm.

WarlockCantrips.Name: Prestidigitation
WarlockCantrips.Description: This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice.

WarlockCantrips.Name: True Strike
WarlockCantrips.Description: You extend your hand and point a finger at a target in range.
